mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE AS partnerCdType /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER /* 채널 고객사 제휴사 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER_PK(P),FK_EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_EZC_CHAN(R),SYS_C0011241(C) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8), EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER_PK(P),SYS_C0011242(C) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER_PK(P),FK_EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_EZC_CHAN(R),SYS_C0011243(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER /* 채널 고객사 제휴사 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE AS partnerCdType /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER /* 채널 고객사 제휴사 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER.CLIENT_CD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER SET /* 채널 고객사 제휴사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_PARTNER /* 채널 고객사 제휴사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
